00019 #include "worker.h"
00020 
00021 #include "iCommand.h"
00022 
00023 namespace co
00024 {
00025 template< class Q > void WorkerThread< Q >::run()
00026 {
00027     while( !stopRunning( ))
00028     {
00029         while( _commands.isEmpty( ))
00030             if( !notifyIdle( )) // nothing to do
00031                 break;
00032 
00033         const ICommands& commands = _commands.popAll();
00034         LBASSERT( !commands.empty( ));
00035 
00036         for( ICommandsCIter i = commands.begin(); i != commands.end(); ++i )
00037         {
00038             // We want to avoid a non-const copy of commands, hence the cast...
00039             ICommand& command = const_cast< ICommand& >( *i );
00040             if( !command( ))
00041             {
00042                 LBABORT( "Error handling " << command );
00043             }
00044             if( stopRunning( ))
00045                 break;
00046 
00047             _commands.pump();
00048         }
00049     }
00050 
00051     _commands.flush();
00052     LBINFO << "Leaving worker thread " << lunchbox::className( this )
00053            << std::endl;
00054 }
00055 
00056 }
